name: The Farmer's Daughter

name: Hidden Away

name: Lap Dance
summary_text: An aspiring actress makes a pact with her fiancé to take a job as an exotic dancer to care for her cancer stricken father. Once the pact the couple made is broken, their lives are changed forever. Based on the true story of director Greg Carter and his girlfriend prior to their moving to Los Angeles in 2005.

name: Infidel

name: Les 11 commandements

name: Time Changer

name: And Now the Screaming Starts!

name: Fourteen Hours

name: Grace
